Text: ENJOY ENJOY The Company you keep 2012 DVDRIP in Small Size and AC3 audio by TODE!

Nice rip--Thanks. As for the AC3 audio i personally can't tell the diff from MP3. I might give a few more bits to the video stream and export the audio as MP3/96kbps, but i'm not complaining. 640xYYY is ideal. Thx.
